components.title: DropFi Mobile App
components.subtitle: Manage your XRPL assets on the go

components.text: The DropFi Mobile App extends the functionality of the DropFi Wallet to mobile devices, providing a secure and user-friendly experience for managing XRP and XRPL tokens on the go. Available for both iOS and Android, the mobile app offers the same powerful features as the desktop version with mobile-optimized interfaces.

features.title: Cross-Platform
features.description: Available for iOS and Android devices

features.title: Biometric Security
features.description: Face ID, Touch ID, and fingerprint support

features.title: Cloud Backup
features.description: Secure encrypted backup to iCloud or Google

features.title: Mobile Optimized
features.description: Touch-friendly interface designed for mobile

components.text: While the DropFi Mobile App provides consistent functionality across platforms, there are some platform-specific features:

items: Face ID support on iPhone X and newer models
Touch ID support on older models
Encrypted iCloud backup for data safety
Encrypted Google backup for data safety
Pattern unlock option for added security

steps.title: Download from App Store
steps.description: Search for "DropFi Wallet" in the App Store or Google Play Store
steps.details: Ensure you're downloading the official DropFi Wallet app from the verified developer

steps.title: Install and Launch
steps.description: Install the app and launch it for the first time
steps.details: Grant necessary permissions for notifications and biometric authentication if prompted

steps.title: Set Up Security
steps.description: Configure your preferred security method (PIN, biometrics, or both)
steps.details: This will be your primary method for accessing the wallet

steps.title: Create or Import Wallet
steps.description: Set up a new wallet or import an existing one using your seed phrase
steps.details: For new users, the app will generate a secure 24-word recovery phrase

tips.title: Official Sources
tips.description: Only download from official app stores to ensure security and authenticity.

tips.title: Permissions
tips.description: The app requires camera access for QR code scanning and biometric access for security.

Various reset options available in the mobile app:

children.text: Perform a complete reset to restore the app to its original state. Note: This requires the recovery phrase to restore the wallet.

tips.title: Backup First
tips.description: Always ensure you have your recovery phrase before performing any reset operations.

components.text: Common issues and solutions for the mobile app:

tips.title: App Crashes
tips.description: Try restarting the app or your device. Ensure you have the latest version installed.

tips.title: Biometric Issues
tips.description: Check your device's biometric settings and ensure the app has proper permissions.

tips.title: Sync Problems
tips.description: Check your internet connection and try refreshing the app. Verify cloud backup is enabled.

tips.title: Performance Issues
tips.description: Clear app cache, restart the app, or check if your device has sufficient storage.
